message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your share decreases each round with inflation.  Let's settle this now with a more reasonable split.
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your last one. This is a good compromise!
This is a small increase for me, but time is running out for you Alice. Let's be pragmatic and close the deal.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going below this. Inflation is hurting me, but I'd rather lose some value than give up too much.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I'm going to start playing hardball. This is your last chance.
